website_summaries.verdict: Basic dumbbell pair with lots of thought and engineering to make your workout more convenient.
pros: Cast iron dumbbells with comfortable, neoprene coating that's easy to grip
Choice of different weight levels up to 5kg
cons: You only get one pair of dumbbells, not a multi-weight set

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! fun to compete!
customer_reviews.text: 💪🏻I got this to get more exercise while at home!💪🏻 and we ended up having a family competition to see who can do more reps!🤸‍♀🤸‍♂ This is great to exercise but also! it can be part of a family/friends game night! ✨I super liked this item, it ended up bringing everyone together!✨
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Don't add extra resistance bands!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he didn't think that the bands that come with it were enough. I bought an extra set of the bands so he could increase the weight. He added one band to the three that comes with it and it snapped in half! It worked well with the bands that it comes with but, don't try to add extra weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Owens

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this a few months ago for my parents who hardly excersize and they absolutely love this device. I've noticed their muscular pain has been allieviated throughout the weeks and I suspect it's due tot his self-therapy. So, having that said, I tried it as well and actually felt a great burn/workout. It looks like it's made out of weak plastic but it's not! In fact, nothing has broken up and it works just as new!
customer_reviews.author: Body by Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Nice light workout
customer_reviews.text: Works well for someone just starting out in their workout routine or not wanting to bulk up. I have three kids one 40lb I still carry at times, so I had to max out on the bands. I could feel it on the advanced band for sure. It reminds me of the device they advertise to lift breasts. My arms are my trouble area that really just need firming. So Good purchase. NOTE: ‘great’ is misspelled on the side of the box (greet) not sure if this was on purpose or somebody did an uh oh
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D Booth

customer_reviews.title: Easy arm workout, good burn!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I needed. Had rotator cuff surgery three years ago and needed something easy and pain free to give me the total arm workout without hurting my shoulder again. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: T. Fairfax

customer_reviews.title: Replacement of band
customer_reviews.text: The runber bands broke easily! Where can get replacement ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you can almost immediately feel the burn
customer_reviews.text: The workout itself is quite good, you can almost immediately feel the burn, and there is a couple of exercises you can try out. For a person who doesn't love to exercise like me, this is the ticket for arms and chest :) You feel the burn immediately and can build up your workout as you like. The key is that I'm using it because it's easy to take from room to room, and can be done while watching TV or outside bird watching. The instructions that come with the product are clear and the exercises are easy, yet you can feel the muscles working.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of exercise equipment. It gives a great work out
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Reed

customer_reviews.title: Results and price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use ! I can already see results !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a muscle building product this isn’t it, there’s not much resistance however if your just looking for an easy work to use every day to keep your muscles moving and a general tightening it works I use this every day while watching tv, but still do my weight training
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: just woweeeeee.....
customer_reviews.text: about a YEAR ago i started having shoulder pain in my left shoulder...intense on and off like a pinched nerve...tried a lot of things..including classical stretch which helped only slightly in spite of a twenty minute workout...saw this on facebook at twice the price...came to amazon where it is always cheaper and faster delivery...i noticed a difference from the first time i used it...i now do 90 reps for each position...my pain has been minimized...my arms are getting stronger...i started with the intermediate band...just great product
customer_reviews.author: exitstmTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not a well built exercise tool.
customer_reviews.text: The nut and bolt assembly as shown in the pictures loosen as you use the apparatus causing it not to operate properly. The bolt can be tightened and can be accessed by removing its plastic covers. Obviously the manufacturer did not use any type of locking washer to prevent this from happening. Fortunately, a lock washer can be added once you remove the Phillips Head bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: It works ok
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works fine, it is just awkward to store as I want it left out so I use it everyday but it is just too big so I just have it sitting on my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Collins

customer_reviews.title: Simple with real results
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something I could use at home that worked. This little gadget really gives results. It works my arms, shoulders and chest muscles without going to gym. I use it while watching tv and before I go to bed. I can’t believe how much firmer and stronger my arms are. My stiff shoulder has loosened and no more aching shoulder. This little gadget is worth every penny. It actually works!
customer_reviews.author: suzyq

customer_reviews.title: great for toning arms
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and appears to be strong. My arms and neck look better after a few weeks use. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, hand grips are unomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for about 5 days and feel it to be a good arm workout for me. The only complaint is that I have arthritic hands/fingers and would sure love to have padding on the hand grips to make it more comfortable, the hard plastic gets a little painful sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen O.

customer_reviews.title: Train those muscle those arms
customer_reviews.text: This workout system is so fabulous. I can work out my arms while I am standing or sitting down. The system comes with 3 rubber band. I just use the most elastic band. After the first day, my arms felt strain. After a few days, I quickly got used to. This system definitely works well. After use, the system can folded for storage. After it's folded, the dimensions are 8 inches x 9.5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Addict

customer_reviews.title: Not enough resistance
customer_reviews.text: I like the design that allows for smooth arm movements but does not have much resistance at all. Even the highest level is too easy and I can do about 50 reps before I feel it and I'm not that strong. I guess this would be okay for really weak or bedridden people. Not so much for an average person.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Needs more weighted bands
customer_reviews.text: I like how this functions, it’s definitely easy to use, but from day 1, I needed to use the heaviest -weighted band they provided. Now - I definitely have a lot of toning needed in my arms, so this isn’t like I purchased this to maintain my already chiseled arms. I’m not sure what I can do with it once I get used to that band. Wished they included more bands or at least a place to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny E Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone just starting out.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with three bands for three different levels. I'm on the first level and I can tell it's helping me regain my strength. It's very nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Horton

customer_reviews.title: Too early to say.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the product for 2 weeks so it’s too early for me to rate this product fairly. I will say I had to use the strongest resistance right off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tones triceps
customer_reviews.text: There was much more resistance than I expected. Would have like more information on ordering more bands.
customer_reviews.author: carnita GIBBS

customer_reviews.title: Use it correctly; portable
customer_reviews.text: Boxed well;instructions easy to follow; I like the portability of the product. It's good to note that when using, only use the hand grips to stretch the band. Don't use the leverage from the arm rests otherwise you'll get little resistance.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Item was defective when received. It came in pieces. Plastic didn't seem strong enough to support resistance bands. Returned and received full refund. Free return
customer_reviews.author: Gab

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Out
customer_reviews.text: Only use the bands it comes with. I ordered the 45 and 55 lbs and broke two of them. Call the company and they sent me a new one. I wished they were made better because I have broken three. The price is right and the work out is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Judeann T Williams

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use this a lot, but the few times I have, it has been fairly easy. I have read other reviews about it breaking so I try my best to follow the instructions and not force it by doing it incorrectly. I could definitely feel the contracting of my muscles afterwards so I'm sure it is effective over time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H.

customer_reviews.title: Read the label before buying. It’s a great item, but not for strength training.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a disabled veteran and need to be more active. I bought this for myself thinking it would be a good way to exercise. I guess I’m stronger than I thought. This would be the perfect tool for the job if it was on my strength category.
customer_reviews.author: David W Johnson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I still surprised how easy it is to use this arm workout machine. I can literally sit on my couch watching movie and still get some workout done. My sister came visit last night. I let her tried it. she fell in love and ordered one for herself right away.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really want to tone my arms and that’s why I bought this ,in the 3rd time I used this it broke the screw loose and I’m having hard time to fix it ..but my husband fix it for me .Its ok now I use it but I’m not 💯 happy with that being said .
customer_reviews.author: Ajweidner

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable arm workout!
customer_reviews.text: This little arm exerciser is great. It is small and portable enough that you can keep it in your car and do it a few minutes while waiting in the school pickup line ! Comes with instructions and different levels of resistance bands. I like that it's easy to use yet effective.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise for anyone. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble . And just a few minutes ysing green band ciukd ferl it in my upper arms. Irdered yesterday, got it today. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen Reichard

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many excerise devices and didn't have much hope in this one. But I was extremely surprised with the quality of the device and that it actually targets the arm muscles it's supposed to. Glad I took the chance. Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: josiebops

customer_reviews.title: Broken strap
customer_reviews.text: I only had this a month and the one band broke. ☹️ You have to buy another whole set to replace one strap. Results from using it are Great.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Mossing

customer_reviews.title: It’s going to work!
customer_reviews.text: I’m getting older and my arms are losing their muscle... After the first use I can already tell with continuous use my muscles will return I am excited!
customer_reviews.author: melinda gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good workout in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: This product works well for myself, but the bands do not offer enough resistance for my husband. I do not recommend for every day use, but occasionally when we are unable to get to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Augie Jr

customer_reviews.title: Poor quailty of rubber bands!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased May 16th and on June 22nd the Level 3-25lb rubber band broke. See attached photo. 2 other bands already showing crack distress in the fold areas. She really enjoys the workout but with poor quaility attachments it want last much longer. Great timing, just missed the retun date. All that we ask as a consumer at least guarantee your product for 90 days. Would not recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: HV Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So far, recently purchased, so good. I can definitely feel targeted muscles firing up . I am looking forward to seeing results very soon..I have had this product for only 3 days. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: B. Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best work out machines I have ever purchased.I love this product. I have been using it for a week and can already see a differece in my arms. Can’t wait to see the different in a few more month.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gore

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the product so far. I just received it this week and I got a pretty good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Ornelas Sawan

customer_reviews.title: if you use it, it works
customer_reviews.text: This works well, if you use it regularly (like most exercise related things). I have the $10 one, and it seems to be, and works exactly the same, hence the 3 stars for value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nnnope
customer_reviews.text: Hate it....no idea how to use the damn waste of $ bands don't stay......
customer_reviews.author: Swowzers

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is flimsy and the bands snapped back and hit me in the nose, very light weight and is not sturdy....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scarmat Arm Workout
customer_reviews.text: I had Cubital Syndrone surgery snd this was an item they used for PT. I love it and use it daily. It is easy to use and the chart is most helpful. Doesn’t come with a case
customer_reviews.author: Irene H. Locke

customer_reviews.title: Arm workout machine
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and it is a very good way to tone my arms without so much weight bearing--so not so hard on my joints. The only thing I haven't liked is that the rubberbands seem to break easily. I have ordered new rubberbands but have to order them in the package of 3 with one of each size, when I really only need one size. Overall however am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great value
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this product and the ease of use. I made a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Imprints
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the arm rests, just from 1 set of 15 reps, left imprints on my arms. As I bruise easily, I don't think this is for me. Will be returning it. Disappointed as I was excited about trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorinda D Boysen

customer_reviews.title: great exercise gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great exercise gadget! it is really well made and the way it works there isn't any pulling on joints. Very clever design in that you push with your upper arms.It comes with 3 levels of resistence bands. Again, it is really well made and has smooth action. I was pleasantly surprised. Especially at that price!
customer_reviews.author: Jefferyi

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and soon found them at Five Below!
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: It's weird. So far it has not seemed to do much as the elastic bands on it are pretty light
customer_reviews.author: snymtns4

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY, I can work my triceps!
customer_reviews.text: Could use heavier bands for a tougher workout, but I still really like it! Super comfortable design and very easy to use. I recommend it for people who casually work out. (You can get a warrantee for reviewing, but they do NOT make you give them good reviews. Just *a* review.)
customer_reviews.author: Emma Chong

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I’m on my stationary bike and it’s a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Daly

customer_reviews.title: Convenient exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: I like that this item can be used in any room and while watching TV. Easy to use and not complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This works really good, boy I felt it the next day, easy to use, firms you up, I love it! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: shar

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for one month and it’s already broke and I can’t return it. Didn’t even get to see if would even work as it described it would. Waste of my money ....very upset with this misleading product.
customer_reviews.author: lori otuel

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Really works my arms fast! Not hard, but made to really get at the hard places.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Sams

customer_reviews.title: Immediately feel burn but bands do not last
customer_reviews.text: Bands don’t last more than 30 days. Need to come up with longer lasting bands. Too bad. I really liked the workout but not worth buying if you have to get new bands every 30-45 days.
customer_reviews.author: Gannyceg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for a couple days. It really works your arms out. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dora Lakwatsera

customer_reviews.title: webite description incorret
customer_reviews.text: on the website it appears that it's very easy to use. Not true, difficult to obtain results that are advertise.
customer_reviews.author: patricia king

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Have used every day since it arrived. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Penney McCoo

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve only had this for a month and it’s already broken. I don’t even know how well it worked to be honest. I had all three bands on it to make it feel like I was doing something. Don’t waist your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Bands r very weak.. had to start at the most resistant band
customer_reviews.author: Sean R

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment Great Concept
customer_reviews.text: Great concept & loved it up until my orange band broke after only using it five days
customer_reviews.author: Nina Sol

customer_reviews.title: A lower star
customer_reviews.text: I like the principle of the workout but as I am coming back from an illness I need one band at a lesser strength to work with to get to the green. I have lost about all of my upper body strength and this looked like a good way to work on getting it back. Do you have a one step down band for the system. Would love to know.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried this a little but I immediately felt my muscles working!
customer_reviews.author: cynw

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this but have high hopes for it!
customer_reviews.author: Aunty me

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The arm grips are alittle uncomfortable. The product began to have a metal smell after using it for a few reps. It became loose quickly too. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Toni-Ann

customer_reviews.title: elastic band
customer_reviews.text: elastic band break easily. No strong enough. after two weeks of used the elastic band stretched and broke
customer_reviews.author: nini

customer_reviews.title: EASILY GET A GREAT ARM WORKOUT!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this to work for when I have some time to stretch and do a little arm workout. This thing folds up nicely and I can use it for 10 minutes and get a little arm workout. It does not replace real weights, but it is good for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry-like

customer_reviews.title: It works... But will be great with a simple tweek.
customer_reviews.text: Love the workout it's easy and convenient to use anytime. Equipment need to be steadier where it's able to endure more reps and bands.
customer_reviews.author: Lady D

customer_reviews.title: Great arm workout! Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I don’t have time to go to the gym, so I love that I can get in an arm workout at home. It is very easy to use and to put together. When you’re done with the workout, it folds up and can be stored without taking much space at all. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Beastmode!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a product that is worth its weight in gold! This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Long Lashes

customer_reviews.title: work out arms equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Firsttime use was great for 1 year. My most recent order is not good . the equipment is very loose, feels like it can break anyday. what can we do about this?
customer_reviews.author: Jane Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: My transfermation
customer_reviews.text: It's works and can't wait to see my results after my set goals
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bagby

customer_reviews.title: I was using the product and it broke apart and hit my hand.
customer_reviews.text: This one broke after very little use. I have one at home that is older and it still works. I thin something was wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Gulley

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best work out machines I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best work out machines I have ever purchased.I love this product. I have been using itfor 2 weeks and can already see a differece in my arms. I have alve already recommended this product to three people.
customer_reviews.author: Carmeng

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality bands
customer_reviews.text: Bands are extremely poor quality. I've been through two sets in two months. Can't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F Ciambrone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Easy to use and I can feel it’s working!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for advanced workout
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use and you can definitely feel it in your triceps, but I had to apply all three bands together on it in order to feel I was getting a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Simone

customer_reviews.title: Band broke after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I had this a few weeks and the band broke. Since I am using the strongest bank the product is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.  Bill

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This is my second one. I love being able to sit on the couch using it and get great results!
customer_reviews.author: Oralia Robi

customer_reviews.title: The poor quality of the resistance bands.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material for the resistance bands. They broke after a couple of workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hoobler

customer_reviews.title: It is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: For upper body work out . Product performs very well. It is exactly the way it’s advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Band is breaking!
customer_reviews.text: Help! The Orange band is splitting! How do I another one?? I have only used this for 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: This broke two weeks after purchasing. I probably only used it 6-7 times before it broke
customer_reviews.author: Jamie K

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I am just now trying it out, seems fine, and I think it will be useful!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: So far I like the product
customer_reviews.text: Just had it a couple of days. but so far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Sarge

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: just got it but it works really good and is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: May03

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is GREAT!!! It is easy to use and really does the job. I have arthritis, fibromalgia and C-Spine issues. My arms had become so weak that I could not even put a cup of water in the microwave, which is over-top my stove. After using this for just a week, I already see a tremendous difference in my muscle strength. I can actually reach the rolls of wrapping paper which are on top of the fridge. Thank You....!!!! R
customer_reviews.author: Regina B. Rohlfing

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to exercise your arms.
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how easy it is to use and it is a great way to exercise my arms. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gross
